attributes.name: Category
attributes.description: The category to which the risk belongs e.g., Financial, Operational, Strategic

attributes.name: Probability
attributes.description: Probability of the risk occurring, usually as a percentage

attributes.name: Impact
attributes.description: Impact of the risk occurring, typically as a percentage or a score

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Current status of the risk e.g., Identified, In Progress, Mitigated, Closed

attributes.name: IdentifiedDate
attributes.description: The date when the risk was identified

attributes.name: MitigationPlan
attributes.description: The plan to mitigate the risk

attributes.name: DueDate
attributes.description: The target date to mitigate or reassess the risk

attributes.name: Owner
attributes.description: The person responsible for managing the risk
